UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Evaluation of an antimicrobial L-amino acid oxidase and peptide derivatives from Bothropoides mattogrosensis pitviper venom.
Literature.Author: Okubo BM, Silva ON, Migliolo L, Gomes DG, Porto WF, Batista CL, Ramos CS, Holanda HH, Dias SC, Franco OL, Moreno SE

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 12953(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=64µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13885(MIC=32µg/ml),Proteus mirabilis ATCC 25933(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=64µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(20-30% Cytotoxicity=512µg/ml)
